headline: Why Shares in Caterpillar Tracked Lower Again Today
summary: Shares in Caterpillar (NYSE: CAT) were down by about 7.5% at 11 a.m. ET today as the market continued to sell off equities in the wake of tariff measures imposed on U.S. trade partners.  In addition, there's a secondary impact whereby commodities like oil, metals, and minerals are also being sold off heavily.

headline: Caterpillar Stock Slides as China Levies Retaliatory Tariffs
summary: Caterpillar shares extended losses Friday amid concerns over the impact of retaliatory tariffs on the company’s global construction footprint.
